channel.title: Suggestion: Basic Bloodline Comparison
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Suggestion: Basic Bloodline Comparison"

item.title: Suggestion: Basic Bloodline Comparison
item.content:encoded:
Basically, a page where you can see the comparison between different bloodlines.
+AP/XP , +Stamina, +Event find, +Appetite, Wkai bonuses, r00t bonuses, PW bonuses, and so on.
